snippet: The group was aiming to reach Germany and had come from the large, long-established Ain al Hilwe Palestinian refugee camp.
abstract: Forty Palestinians from Lebanon's Ain al Hilwe Palestinian refugee camp seeking to reach Germany by boat are arrested in Lebanese port of Tripoli, where access without security clearance or ferry ticket is prohibited.
lead_paragraph: The group was aiming to reach Germany and had come from the large, long-established Ain al Hilwe Palestinian refugee camp.

headline.main: Lebanon: 40 Palestinians Are Arrested as They Seek to Join Migrant Wave
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Lebanon: 40 Palestinians Are Arrested as They Seek to Join Migrant Wave

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
